title: 2024 FRP Unlock
desc: Attempts to use AT in order to overload and trick the system into enabling ADB, and then using that to unlock the device.
pros: Works on most devices still on the 2024 patch
cons: Needs a slightly more powerful PC
Only confirmed to work on U.S. models

title: 2022-2023 FRP Unlock
desc: Attempts to use AT in order to overload and trick the system into enabling ADB, and then using that to unlock the device.
pros: Works on most devices still 2022-2023 patch
cons: Not confirmed to work on all devices

title: Pre-2022 FRP Unlock
desc: Attempts to use AT in order to easily enable ADB, and then using that to unlock the device.
pros: Works on most devices still pre-2022 patch
The OG unlock method used by tons of tools

title: LG Screen Unlock
desc: Attempts to use AT in order to easily unlock the device.
pros: Works on most devices still pre-G5

title: Moto Fastboot FRP Unlock
desc: This unlock method utilizes fastboot in order to attempt to delete partitions which contain FRP lock info.
pros: Likely to unlock on most Motorola devices
cons: May not be easy for average users
Can be hard to get into fastboot
Not likely to work on more recent devices.
